price: Hranite se dopuštenim i lijepim jelima koja vam Allah daruje i budite zahvalni Allahu na blagodatima Njegovim, ako samo Njega obožavate.
arabic: فَكُلُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗا وَٱشۡكُرُواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ إِن كُنتُمۡ إِيَّاهُ تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fakulū mimmā razaqakumu al-lahu ḥalālan ṭayyiban wa-ush'kurū niʿ'mata al-lahi in kuntum iyyāhu taʿbudūna
